actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to permit the construction and operation of facilities other than a hotel upon the Fort Monroe Military Reservation in Virginia.

summary.text: Authorizes the person to whom the Secretary of War granted permission to construct and operate a hotel on the Fort Monroe Military Reservation in Virginia to adapt the hotel for other uses as such person deems appropriate.

titles.title: A bill to permit the construction and operation of facilities other than a hotel upon the Fort Monroe Military Reservation in Virginia.
